preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 120 g of lead, 64 g of selenium, 36 g of silicon, and 36 g of tin using a precision scale.  
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all ingredients.  
 3. Use a pestle and mortar to grind the mixture into a fine powder, ensuring thorough mixing.
